com.metsci.glimpse.event.mouse
Interface Mouseable

All Superinterfaces:
GlimpseMouseListener, GlimpseMouseMotionListener, GlimpseMouseWheelListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
BingTilePlot, ColorAxisPlot2D, DncTestTilePlot, EncTestTilePlot, GlimpseAxisLayout1D, GlimpseAxisLayout2D, GlimpseAxisLayoutX, GlimpseAxisLayoutY, GlimpseLayout, MapPlot2D, MinimapLayout, MultiAxisPlot2D, Plot2D, SimplePlot2D, StackedPlot2D, StackedTimePlot2D
public interface Mouseable
extends GlimpseMouseListener, GlimpseMouseMotionListener, GlimpseMouseWheelListener

Any object which can receive Glimpse mouse listeners and provide callbacks when mouse events occur.

Author:
ulman
